thread.title: The Little Girl From "Titanic" Is All Grown Up And Still Crazy Adorable
thread.title_full: The Little Girl From "Titanic" Is All Grown Up And Still Crazy Adorable

author: Crystal Ro
title: The Little Girl From "Titanic" Is All Grown Up And Still Crazy Adorable
text:
She told BuzzFeed, “My mom has an amazing picture of me, Leo, Kate, and my little sister Rachel hanging out when they were resetting for the dancing scene. It’s one of my favorites and is a reminder of just how lucky I am to have worked with two of the best actors out there.” ID: 10413556 View this image ›
Alex Owens-Sarno / Via instagram.com “Leonardo DiCaprio was an absolute doll. He was so fun and charming. He loved to put a smile on everyone’s face. [I’d often] be on his lap with a PB&J in between takes.”
ID: 10413849 9. In fact, there’s even a deleted scene where Jack sketches with Cora. View this image ›
Paramount Pictures Alex explained, “James Cameron had done all of Jack’s sketches [for the movie], and they had the sketch Jack does of Cora signed by Leonardo DiCaprio for me. Unfortunately, it got stolen out of someone’s trailer. That would have been the most amazing keepsake!”
ID: 10413607 10. These days Alex dedicates herself to studying acting and recently earned her degree in writing from California State University, Long Beach. View this image ›
Alex Owens-Sarno / Via instagram.com “I’ve been writing sketch comedy that I’ll start producing very soon, and I’m also in the process of writing a novel.”
ID: 10413916 11. No doubt, Jack would be very proud of his best girl. View this image ›
Paramount Pictures ID: 10414004
 More News About Leonardo Dicaprio, Kate Winslet
